title: [US]Creator Lead Management
content:
# Introduction: What is Creator Leads Management？ Creator Leads is a feature designed for CAP to manage and follow up with all creator leads before establishing an official linking relationship with the creator. ++Please note: This feature is still under testing and is only available to CAPs on the allowlist. Please check with your CAP manager if you have any questions.++ # What are the benefits？ ✅ **More Creator Leads:** you can spread the promotion code offline to connect with more creators. ✅ **Centralized Lead Management:** Provide a consolidated page to handle and track all livestream creator leads
# Steps Please ensure you are using the **main account** or **member account with Creator lead management permission** before visiting this page.
### Get more leads through promotion codes You can navigate to [TIkTok Shop Partner Center -> Creator management-Lead management. ](https://partner.us.tiktokshop.com/affiliate-creator/lead-management?market=100)By downloading the QR code, you can spread this exclusive QR code to gain more leads offline.
Note: If you are also a Top LIVE agency CAP, you will receive some leads from Top LIVE agencies. Creators can click "Learn More" to apply for collaboration. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/64d392560be8470aa9dd2e9dd6508ab3~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/938aea4c492c43a29cba0f234ffe5cd6~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/dbcb6cd8f6014e52928393e59a634543~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/4eab4bb44f6c4cbea603df30644b31ab~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ### Check creator performance to consider further collaboration. You can search specific creators by **username,** and **view** the creator profile by clicking the creator's name.
You can check the highest GMV LIVE dashboard in the last 30 days by clicking View Live Dashboard. Note: 1. There will be no data if this creator has no live stream data in the past 30 days 2)The visible data is valid for only 7 days. If it has been 7 days since the creator applied, the information will no longer be accessible. ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/7e0fe616c0254592b5bd173e1f9ca63c~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ![Image](https://p16-arcosite-va.ibyteimg.com/tos-maliva-i-10qhjjqwgv-us/6e25fa1e9ae54f78b6affbc94eee8aaf~tplv-10qhjjqwgv-image.image) ### Message Creator and invite to link You can send a message to the creator to get more information, and share invitations to link with this creator if you would like to build an official linking relationship with this creator. Note: The "invite to link" button may not appear if this creator is already linked with you.
### Manage your creator leads with status tags and notes. Status tag: The lead status will be set as a new opportunity as default. You can update the lead's status manually according to your needs. * **Follow up:** All newly created leads. * **In progress:** Leads currently in contact progress. * **Contacted:** Leads that have been successfully contacted. * **Invalid**: Leads that are no longer valid or actionable.
You can also add notes (up to 200 words) for leads to help you manage them more effectively.
### FAQ ### Why can't I access leads management? Lead management is now only available for the cap on the allowlist. Please contact your account manager for more information. ### How can I be displayed on this Top LIVE agencies list？ Please get in touch with your account manager and check if you have met the criteria for Top LIVE agencies CAP ### Why can't I see part of the creator's data or contact info？ There are two possible reasons: 1)The data might not be available for display, or the creator may not have authorized data sharing. 2)The visible data is valid for only 7 days. If it has been 7 days since the creator applied, the information will no longer be accessible.
